member.name: M:robot_controller_api.Controllers.MapsController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a single map by identifier.
member.param: The identifier of the desired map.
member.returns: The matching if found; otherwise a 404 result.

member.name: M:robot_controller_api.Controllers.MapsController.Create(robot_controller_api.Models.Map)
member.returns: The created map with a 201 status code.

member.name: M:robot_controller_api.Controllers.MapsController.Update(System.Int32,robot_controller_api.Models.Map)
member.param: The identifier of the map being updated.
member.returns: An empty result with a 204 status code on success.

member.name: M:robot_controller_api.Controllers.MapsController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.param: Identifier of the map to delete.

member.name: M:robot_controller_api.Controllers.RobotCommandsController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a robot command by identifier.
member.returns: The matching if found; otherwise a 404 result.

member.summary: Creates a new robot command entry.
member.returns: The created command with a 201 status code.
